donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
outputs.output_descr:
The overall goal of the UN Country Team Joint Programme to Support Domestic Violence Act Implementation in Thailand (2010-2012) is women and girls facing Domestic Violence receive well-functioning protection and support services through roghts-based and gender responsive implementation of the Domestic Violence Act in Thailand.
The expected outputs include:
1. Support MSDHS and other relevant agencies to map out and review existing databases on gender-based violence, with a particular focus on domestic violence, to identify existing tools, data sources and gaps. National Violence against Women indicators to be identified and agreed.
2. Provide technical assistance to  MSDHS and other relevant agencies to enhance their capacity to work together to define and develop a viable system for a coordinated gender-baed violence/ domestic violence database  at the national level.
3. Provide technical assistance to  MSDHS and other relevant agencies to set up a local-level gender-based violence/ domestic violence database at the local level in the pilot areas as a pilot for development of the national database.
4. Produce documentaries or short films on domestic violence to be used in awareness raising campaign, public events, training programmes and broadcast by local and national media channels.

project_descr: Every Home a Safe Home: Supporting Thailand Towards Effective Implementation of Protection of Domestic Violence Victims Act BE 2550 (2007)
project_title: Supporting implementation of Domestic Violence Act 2007
